name: Miro
title: miro.com
shortDescription: Miro is a collaborative online whiteboard platform designed to empower teams to work more effectively. With its limitless canvas, teams from various departments such as IT, design, and project management can brainstorm, plan, and execute their ideas seamlessly. Example use case includes strategic planning, roadmapping, and running design workshops remotely.
pros: Integration with major tools like Microsoft and Google
cons: Can be overwhelming for new users
Potential privacy concerns with extensive data sharing
May require a strong internet connection for optimal performance
